channel.title: Abouts on Hankou
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Hankou

item.title: About
item.description: hankou.com is an online humanities space dedicated to recording and observing the urban changes and citizens’ lives in Wuhan (especially Hankou). We explore the unique temperament and pulse of the city through in-depth essays, stories and comments. In every crowded land, I hear the quiet voices of people and see the ignored fate.
